abstract: Alltel may be the subject of two successive takeovers over the past year, including its recent sale to Verizon Wireless for $28 billion. But before those, the nation’s fifth-largest cellphone service provider sought to strike a few other deals — with itself as the buyer.
lead_paragraph: Alltel may be the subject of two successive takeovers over the past year, including its recent sale to Verizon Wireless for $28 billion. But before those, the nation’s fifth-largest cellphone service provider sought to strike a few other deals — with itself as the buyer.

headline.main: Alltel’s Deals That Might Have Been
